column1: Aww, aren't you two cute holdin' hands. Are you special little buddies?
You must have one dusty computer.
What's this?
Thanks.
Well, it's some new big thing from Japan. I tell you, those Japanese really know how to market to kids.
There you go, son. I honestly don't know what you see in these things.
I guess I'll call it a night.
What?
What the hell is goin' on here?
Hello-o? Ey, hello?
Rr-Red Harris? I own a toy store in America?
Hello boys. Find everything you need?
Mokay, let's see here. Toilet paper  Toilet paper  Toilet paper  Toilet paper  Toilet paper  So, what are you kids up to tonight?
Nice relaxing night at home, huh? Toilet paper  Toilet paper  Aaand toilet paper  Eh, hey.  Now you kids be careful with this chewing gum.Don't go sticking it under tables.
Okay. Toilet paper  Toilet paper  Tooilet paper  You know, son, I rmember you comin' in last week and buying this much toilet paper.
... Toilet paper  Toilet paper
You wanted to see me, Officer Barbrady?
Welcome to Make Your Own Video. All set to rock and roll?
Uh, well, it's nine ninety five for a three-minute tape.
All right, just come over here and stand in front of the green screen.  What kind of song do you want?
You know, I've seen a lot of videos here at the mall, and that was by far the best!
Hey, I've got a friend who's interning at a big record label in L.A. I'll send a copy on to him and maybe he'll get the bigwigs to see ya.
Gaur da'ka?
Uh oh... Can I help... you?
Chicken sandwich?
A cheeg- fry?
A cheeg- fry?
